name: Fighter
description: Balances offense and defense in battle. Can use their shield to counter attacks. The leader of the Battlefield.

name: Hunter
description: Able to deal precise damage from long distances. Has a variety of support abilities by the use of special arrows. The Sniper of the Battlefield.

name: Priest
description: Supports the party with healing and support magick. Can not only heal, but also reveal weaknesses of enemies. The Pillar of the Battlefield.

name: Shieldsage
description: Attracts attention and protects others with their strong defense. Convert the power of their enemis into magick of the five elements to attack and support. The Fortress of the Battlefield.

name: Seeker
description: An acrobat who excels at hit and run tactics. Uses a rope to instantly move to the blind spot of large enemies. The Gale of the Battlefield.

name: Sorcerer
description: Magician who commands great magick to cause greater harm. Can enhance magick by chanting, but needs to be protected. The Calamity of the Battlefield.

name: Element Archer
description: Mysterious archer who manipulates magick into their magick bow. They can attack enemies, supports alliers and show the weak points of enemies. They Eyes of the Battlefield.

name: Warrior
description: Endures pain to deliver even greater damage to their enemies. One swing of their huge sword can even bury enemies. The Behemoth of the Battlefield.

name: Alchemist
description: Soldier who attracks the enemies'' attention using alchemy and high mobility. Uses the secret of alchemy to inflict and manipulate status abnormalities. The Trickster of the Battlefield.

name: Spirit Lancer
description: A warrior blessed and protected by the spirits. With their spirit spear they can heal, lead and support the party. The Druid of the Battlefield.

name: High Scepter
description: A magical swordsman who uses his sword to take his enemies'' magic into his own hands. Transforms magic into offensive and defensive magic. He shines by overturning the battle situation in various situations.
